name: Chicken with Olives and Lemon (Stew)
steps: Brown chicken pieces in olive oil until lightly golden.
Add onions and garlic, sauté until soft.
Add ginger, saffron, salt and pepper, stir well.
Add olives and lemon (or preserved lemons).
Cover and simmer on low heat for about 60 minutes, until the chicken is tender and the sauce has reduced.
description: Savory chicken stew with olives and lemon — a comforting Moroccan dish.
